author: COMSOL
description: This example demonstrates how to plot the interference pattern from the combination of two rays with slightly different optical path length. A simple Michelson interferometer is used to achieve a change of optical path length which is done by moving one of the mirrors.
label: michelson_interferometer.mph
name: root
